results.content: Great course, exactly what I needed, enough to get up and running with Folium. One suggestion would be to clean the data and organize before the video - while that's an important, it took time away learning directly about Folium.

response.content: Appreciate the feedback! Glad you've learnt something.
response.content_html: Appreciate the feedback! Glad you've learnt something.

results.content: The beginning was a bit slow but then I learned many useful things.

results.content:
The content is good  and the structure is easy to follow. I know a bit about folium but this helped reinforce and teach me a few new things ?

However, keep on spreading the knowledge ?

results.content:
I wanted to do a graphical analysis, based on some Property Values in South-Africa, and this course helped me in various topics, where some you-tube tutorials failed to do so...  
I found it a practical, short-and sweet and a to-the-point course!  Congrats to the tutor of Cape Town!
results.content_html:

results.content: Tutor has good voice and responds to questions quickly. He has good knowledge.
